All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
This is the super class AbstractDAO that has methods for every DAO in the project.
AddClientView
AddClient view is a class that extends JFrame.It will have the role of showing an interface with fields for all the client atributes.
AddProductView
AddProduct view is a class that extends JFrame.It will have the role of showing an interface with fields for all the product atributes.
BillView
Shows the Bill for the chosen id
Client
Client class: it has all the atributes the same as the table columns.It has getters and setters for the atributes
ClientBLL
Validates the fields before doing a specific operation on the table
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class contains methods specific to client-related operations, such as findById and insert.
ClientsView
Interface for showing clients
ConnectionFactory
 
Controller
This is the Controller for the MainWindow with the menu
EmailValidator
 
MainView
Main View: It has 3 options:CLIENTS,PRODUCTS,ORDERS press the button of the option wanted to pop a new window with the table desired
Order
Order class: it has all the atributes the same as the table columns.It has getters and setters for the atributes
OrderDAO
The OrderDAO class is similar to ClientDAO and ProductDAO but includes its own specialized methods and more complex queries specifically designed for managing orders.
OrdersView
Graphical Interface for showing the orders
PhoneNumberValidator
 
Product
Product class: it has all the atributes the same as the table columns.It has getters and setters for the atributes
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class contains methods specific to product-related operations, such as findById and insert.
ProductsView
GUI for showing Products, it has getters and setters for each part of the GUI
Start1
This is the start Class with the main that launches the menu Interface and it has the controller atributed
UpdateClientView
GUI for updating a Client from the clients table
UpdateProductsView
GUI for updating a product from products table
Validator<T>
